data.name: Swing Striker
data.detailed_description:
Swing Striker is an epic futuristic sport with easy to pick up/hard to master gameplay and a backstory that's out of this galaxy!

Players swing around an arena using grappling hooks, trying to hit a giant ball into a goal. Along the way, they smash into each other, sometimes losing limbs in the process... You can play against friends locally, online, or through a full Super Meat Boy inspired single player story mode.

You may remember Swing Striker as our 2012 Flash game, Swing Soccer, which has 25M+ plays across the web. We're excited to finally flesh out the story, add depth to the gameplay, and bring it to Steam!


Swing Striker is a sport unlike anything we have today. A sport where completely exploding your opponent into pieces as you swing over lasers is just part of an average game.


From plant people, to robots, to crazy militant squirrels, Swing Striker’s cast of characters knows no limit! Each one has unique voice acting and backstories that will unlock and twist together over time.


Play with up to 4 friends locally and online! Feeling brave? Try out online competitive matchmaking mode to win more unlockable content.


Embark on an adventure to save the sport of Swing Striker itself from a mysterious evil bent on shutting it down.


Swing your way through a challenging single player mode full of puzzles, platforming challenges, and enemies out to get you.


We couldn’t make a single player mode without including a boss fight or two. Will you get good enough to win and unlock the exclusive vanity item?


Show off the awesome hats, skins, and (coming soon) emojis you win by completing challenges in the game.


Swing Striker should work with pretty much any type of gamepad. We even built an arcade cabinet to play it on! However, we do find it works best when played with a PS or XBox controller. Let us know if you run into any issues.


We plan on adding in new levels, characters, and story updates each season to take you on a journey through Swing Striker's ever-expanding universe!

Happy swingin'!

data.short_description: Intergalactic grappling hook soccer like you've never seen it before!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3600+ @ 1.9 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra - 10.13
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 780m
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
